mapper.sql: C.USER_ID as user_id, C.USERNAME as username, C.PASSWORD as password, C.FULLNAME as fullname, C.NO_HP as no_hp, C.EMAIL as email, C.KD_FUNGSI as kd_fungsi, C.GROUP_KD as group_kd, C.F_AKTIF as f_aktif, C.USER_CREATE as user_create, C.TGL_CREATE as tgl_create, C.JAM_CREATE as jam_create, C.USER_UPDATE as user_update, C.TGL_UPDATE as tgl_update, C.JAM_UPDATE as jam_update, C.USER_NONAKTIF as user_nonaktif, C.TGL_NONAKTIF as tgl_nonaktif, C.JAM_NONAKTIF as jam_nonaktif

WHERE 1=1 AND ( user_id like CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') OR username like CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') OR password like CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') OR fullname like CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') OR no_hp like CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') OR email like CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') OR kd_fungsi like CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') OR group_kd like CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') OR user_create like CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') OR jam_create like CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') OR user_update like CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') OR jam_update like CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') OR user_nonaktif like CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') OR jam_nonaktif like CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user ( USER_ID, USERNAME, PASSWORD, FULLNAME, NO_HP, EMAIL, KD_FUNGSI, GROUP_KD, F_AKTIF, USER_CREATE, TGL_CREATE, JAM_CREATE, USER_UPDATE, TGL_UPDATE, JAM_UPDATE, USER_NONAKTIF, TGL_NONAKTIF, JAM_NONAKTIF ) values ( #{user_id}, #{username}, #{password}, #{fullname}, #{no_hp}, #{email}, #{kd_fungsi}, #{group_kd}, #{f_aktif, JDBCTYPE=INTEGER}, #{user_create}, #{tgl_create}, #{jam_create}, #{user_update}, #{tgl_update}, #{jam_update}, #{user_nonaktif}, #{tgl_nonaktif}, #{jam_nonaktif} )
